Item.TextToWrite: You're up early, $. I'm guessing you get great pleasure from watching the sunrise as well? `
Item.SelectableOptions: There really is something magical about it. ~I wholeheardtedly agree.,Not particularly~ ...Oh?

Item.TextToWrite: Sarah's coffee is fantastic. If you're not into caffeine she also serves hot chocolate which I can personally vouch for.
$, good to see you. How can I help? `
Item.SelectableOptions: I'd like to see what's for sale.~OpenDobbinShop,Nevermind.~ExitDialogue

Item.TextToWrite: Will you be waking up early tomorrow? `
Item.SelectableOptions: Yep! ~The early bird gets the worm after all.,Probably not~ Well, everyone needs their rest I suppose.
